トピック.授業計画1: All 14 classes will be tuaght face to face. Students who are permitted to attend online will be given readings and writing assignments through the LUNA website.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are expected to learn the Kansai dialect vocabulary and grammar introduced in the textbook and lectures. In the case of a native speaker of Japanese, the weight given to learning Japanese will be greatly reduced, and the weight given to understanding the theoretical concepts will be greatly increased.
